content: अरित्र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [गच्छत्यनेन; ऋ-इत्र <ls>P. III. 2. 184</ls>] <ab>Ved.</ab> {@--1@} Propelling, urging onwards. {@--2@} Protecting on all sides. --त्रं {@--1@} An oar; लोलैररित्रैश्चरणैरिवाभितः <ls>Śi. 12. 71.</ls> {@--2@} A rudder, helm. {@--3@} A ship, boat. {@--4@} A part of a carriage. {@--5@} A Soma vessel. --त्रः A Soma vessel. [<ab>cf.</ab> <ab>L.</ab> {%aratrum%}; <ab>Gr.</ab> {%eretmos%}].
